009package ColorEdges;
010
011
012import java.util.List;
013
014import ij.IJ;
015import ij.ImagePlus;
016import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
017import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
018import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
019import imagingbook.common.color.edge.CannyEdgeDetector;
020import imagingbook.common.color.edge.EdgeTrace;
021import imagingbook.common.color.edge.CannyEdgeDetector.Parameters;
022
023/**
024 * This plugin implements the Canny edge detector for all types of images.
025 * @author W. Burger
026 * @version 2021/11/26
027 * @version 2022/03/22 revised dialog
028 */
029public class Color_Edges_Canny implements PlugInFilter {
030        
031        static boolean showEdgeMagnitude = true;
032        static boolean showEdgeOrientation = true;
033        static boolean showBinaryEdges = true;
034        static boolean listEdgeTraces = false;
035        
036        ImagePlus imp = null;
037        
038        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus imp) {
039                this.imp = imp;
040                return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
041        }
042
043        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
044                
045                Parameters params = new Parameters();
046                if (!runDialog(params)) return;
047                
048                CannyEdgeDetector detector = new CannyEdgeDetector(ip, params);
049                
050                if (showEdgeMagnitude) {
051                        ImageProcessor eMag = detector.getEdgeMagnitude();
052                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Edge Magnitude sigma=" + params.gSigma, eMag)).show();
053                }
054                
055                if (showEdgeOrientation) {
056                        ImageProcessor eOrt = detector.getEdgeOrientation();
057                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Edge Orientation sigma=" + params.gSigma, eOrt)).show();
058                }
059                
060                if (showBinaryEdges) {
061                        ImageProcessor eBin = detector.getEdgeBinary();
062                        (new ImagePlus("Canny Binary Edges sigma=" + params.gSigma, eBin)).show();
063                }
064                
065                if(listEdgeTraces) {
066                        List<EdgeTrace> edgeTraces = detector.getTraces();
067                        IJ.log("number of edge traces: " + edgeTraces.size());
068                        int i = 0;
069                        for (EdgeTrace et : edgeTraces) {
070                                IJ.log(i + ". " + et.toString());
071                                i++;
072                        }
073                }
074        }
075
076        private boolean runDialog(Parameters params) {
077                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
078                // Canny parameters:
079                params.addToDialog(gd);
080                // plugin parameters:
081                gd.addMessage("Plugin parameters:");
082                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge magnitude", showEdgeMagnitude);
083                gd.addCheckbox("Show edge orientation", showEdgeOrientation); 
084                gd.addCheckbox("Show binary edges", showBinaryEdges);
085                gd.addCheckbox("List edge traces", listEdgeTraces);
086                // display dialog
087                gd.showDialog();
088                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
089                        return false;
090                }       
091                // update Canny parameters:
092                params.getFromDialog(gd);
093                if (params.gSigma < 0.5f) params.gSigma = 0.5f;
094                if (params.gSigma > 20) params.gSigma = 20;
095                
096                // update plugin parameters:
097                showEdgeMagnitude = gd.getNextBoolean();
098                showEdgeOrientation = gd.getNextBoolean();
099                showBinaryEdges = gd.getNextBoolean();
100                listEdgeTraces = gd.getNextBoolean();
101                return true;
102        }
103        
104}
